title: Is Fitness certification required in all gyms? - Quora

response.answer_text: The personal trainers whom we watch for celebrities and in gyms are the ones who are properly trained with proper certification. As we see, they are so perfect, and their work is seen with impressive figures and physic of the actors. If they really inspire you, you have to work hard and most importantly have a proper certification which reflects your learning of fitness. A certification is a reflection and a proof of your learning and skills developed for fitness world. Without a certification, you will not be considered as a trainer. Whether it is a gym or going for a personal trainer, there is a requirement of personal trainer certification. Without it, you would not be good paid as well.
